content.question: The condition of the workers and their families as portrayed by Kollwitz is best explained in the context of which of the following?

choices.label: The failure of Germany to industrialize at the same time as Great Britain
Industrial boom and bust cycles and the lack of an effective social safety net
The abolition of serfdom in Prussia and the end of feudal obligations
Shortages of skilled labor for newly mechanized industries such as textiles

content.answer: Industrial boom and bust cycles and the lack of an effective social safety net

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
